item.title: Katrina - Walking on Sunshine
item.description:
Ukulele play along Walking On Sunshine - Katrina And The Waves
Using the chords: C F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU and D D D DU U U DU DU
** This song can be played using a few different strum patterns.
Personally I find a combination of the two examples above work for me and but as always whatever suits each player best.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
